author: cmlenz
msg: Make most of the methods protected, so that the only entry point from outside is the main merge(WebXml) method. Also, move the generation of a warning when a 2.3 descriptor is merged into a 2.2 descriptor into this class.

author: cmlenz
msg: Use the new WebXmlVersion class when creating a deployment descriptor from scratch

author: cmlenz
msg: Add a typesafe enum class that represents the servlet API versions (2.2 and 2.3 currently).

author: cmlenz
msg: Run the tests after the distribution has been assembled. Thus the called build file of the sample-servlet will be able to use the copied JARs, and less duplication is necessary in the main build file.

author: cmlenz
msg: - Make page printable (with the new stylesheet anyway)
- Both IE and Mozilla do client-side XSLT
